{{Infobox battle item |name = Pink Bow |image = [[File:Pink Bow.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Pink Bow''. |location =
*[[Pink Bow#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Pink Bow''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Fairy_Type_icon.png|30px]] Fairy type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Pinkan Mountain|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Tohjo Falls|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Pokémon Village|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Mina's Houseboat|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
